Title: Relates to the encroachment or adverse effect upon military operations by tall energy structures, major renewable energy facilities or wind energy facilities
Summary: Relates to the encroachment or adverse effect upon military operations by tall energy structures, major renewable energy facilities or wind energy facilities; requires written determination.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the encroachment or adverse effect upon military operations by tall energy structures, major renewable energy facilities or wind energy facilities
